item.title: Cladded Armor
item.description: ![[notes/images/cladded_armor.png]] Cladded Amor was added with the Dark Forest makeover. It can be naturally found within Woodland Mansions or crafted with Leather Armor and Crude Cladding and a Cladding Upgrade Smithing Template in a Smithing Table.

item.title: Cowboy Hat
item.description: ![[notes/images/cowboy_hat.png]] The Cowboy Hat was added with the Badlands makeover. It can be naturally found within Ghost Towns or as a drop from Marauders.

item.title: Witch Hat
item.description: ![[notes/images/witch_hat.png]] The Witch Hat was added with the Swamp makeover. It can be naturally found within Sunken Ruins or as a rare drop from Witches.

item.title: ðŸŽ© Hats & Armor
item.description: Biome Makeover adds equipment for you to wear these are. Hats Hats offer little protection, but look stylish. Some may have special abilities.
